description.en:
What is the project about?
Goldbank is a community-owned lending protocol that enables seamless borrowing and lending on Arbitrum.

What makes your project unique?
The team at Goldbank has taken many of the features that have made ve(3,3) a success, and adapted them for use with lending and borrowing.

History of your project.
v1 launch at may15; v2 launch at may 24

What’s next for your project?
revamp the ve(3,3) model into our lending and borrowing

What can your token be used for?
stake and vote
